module.name: Call Waiting
module.description: Provides an option to turn on/off call waiting
module.changelog: *15.0.4.6* FREEI-3608 whoops error on rebuild *15.0.4.5* FREEI-3571 Add getWidgetListByModule method callwaitign module *15.0.4.4* Packaging of ver 15.0.4.4 *15.0.4.3* Packaging of ver 15.0.4.3 *15.0.4.2* FREEI-767 Restoring FPBX 15 Backup to FPBX 15 system is disabling Call Waiting on extensions *15.0.4* fixing legacy restore *15.0.3* Rest Api *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Impliment Backup *14.0.1.1* UCP fixes and updates *14.0.1* UCP 14
